Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the long chain scorpion toxin family (Class 3 subfamily)
Sequence Information.Function: Hge-scorpine has antibacterial activity against B. subtilis, but not against S. aureus. Also has hemolytic and cytolytic activities. Hge36 peptide blocks Kv1.1/KCNA1 (IC50=185 nM) potassium channels. Shows a weak hemolytic activity.
Sequence Information.Miscellaneous: The C-terminus (AA 52-95) blocks Kv1.1/KCNA1, Kv1.2/KCNA2, and Kv1.3/KCNA2 potassium channels, showing a potential important role of AA 48-51. Hge36 peptide does not block Kv1.2/KCNA2 and Kv1.3/KCNA3.
